summary.subject: Combined Call for Papers & Workshop Proposals: ICSA 2026

conference.name: 23rd IEEE International Conference on Software Architecture

calls.theme: Architecting in Continuous Software Engineering: Evolving Roles, Enduring Principles

calls.focus: Context-driven solutions tailored to specific domains or organizations

workshop_proposals.details: Propose a workshop to discuss emerging trends and research in software architecture.

summary.closing_statement: We look forward to your contributions and hope to see you in Amsterdam!
